DOC.brief_summary: 12 obese subject receive peripheral administration placebo 4 escalate dos PYY1-36 another 12 obese subject receive peripheral administration placebo 4 escalate dos PYY3-36 5 different test day within one week . The patient test single blind dose escalate protocol . Measurements appetite , ad libitum energy intake , blood pressure blood sampling perform test day .
DOC.brief_title: The Role Peptide YY ( PYY ) Inhibiting Food Intake .
DOC.criteria: Normal weight ( BMI : 1823 kg/m2 ) 12 overweight/obese ( BMI : 2740 kg/m2 ) Body weight fluctuation < 5 kg past 2 month . Blood pressure normal mildly hypertensive ( < 159/99 mm Hg ) Nonelite athletes plan change physical activity study . Any physiological psychological illness could influence study result . Regular use medicine . Smoking define < 1 cigarette per day . Substance abuse dependence . Blood donation within past 3 month enter study . Drinking > 21 alcoholic units/week . Food allergy . Special diet ( e.g . vegetarian ) dislike food serve study .
